item.title: Hulking Out! Why You Change When You're Angry
item.description:
When mild-mannered David Banner gets mad he transforms into the raging Incredible Hulk. Dr Laurie Santos loves this comic book tale - because it reflects real life. Intense things like anger, pain, even hunger, can cause us to act in extreme ways that we might not predict beforehand or forgive afterwards.

When we're in so-called "hot states" we might become a total stranger to ourselves... Feed: https://www.omnycontent.com/d/playlist/e73c998e-6e60-432f-8610-ae210140c5b1/96c5c41e-0bc8-4661-b184-ae32006cd726/d623ef0b-3fee-4c26-b815-ae32006cd739/podcast.rss

item.title: 136. Hot Girl Fall Habits : Reset and Re-Connect
item.description: Are you scared of your seasonal depression sneaking up on you? ME TOO. In today's episode, I go through the best ways that I am avoiding a seasonal depression slump. I feel like there is NEVER a bad time to start working on yourself, and felt like recently I have been needing to motivate + inspire myself more than usual. I came up with the best tips for you guys to feel your best this fall... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/2bddcd4c/podcast/rss
